title: How to Check Your Adobe License

steps.title: Go to https://licensing.adobe.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://licensing.adobe.com/ in a web browser. You can use any web browser to login to the LWS and check your license.

steps.title: Login with your Adobe information.
steps.content: Login with your Adobe information. The Adobe ID is usually your email.

steps.title: Click Licenses.
steps.content: Click Licenses . You'll see this in the horizontal menu near the top of the page.

steps.title: Click Obtain License Certificates.
steps.content: Click Obtain License Certificates . It's near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Enter your selection criteria (if your licenses aren't displayed immediately) and click Search.
steps.content: Enter your selection criteria (if your licenses aren't displayed immediately) and click Search . If you want to look for your Illustrator license, specify that.

steps.title: Click the license you want to check.
steps.content: Click the license you want to check. The certificate will then open in PDF format that you can save to your local computer. [1] X Research source
